meanings.definition: A person who wears a mask or costume at a masquerade.
meanings.sent1: The masqueraders at the party wore colorful masks.
meanings.sent2: The masqueraders danced gracefully in their elaborate costumes.
meanings.sent3: The masqueraders giggled as they tried on different masks.
meanings.sent4: The masqueraders blended into the crowd like chameleons.
meanings.sent5: The masqueraders stood out with their mysterious masks.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in a masquerade.
meanings.sent1: We invited all the masqueraders to join the parade.
meanings.sent2: The masqueraders gathered in the ballroom for the event.
meanings.sent3: The masqueraders shared stories of their favorite costumes.
meanings.sent4: The masqueraders added excitement to the festival.
meanings.sent5: The masqueraders brought a sense of mystery to the occasion.
